blocks.name: ccnext
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the continuous extension operation.

blocks.name: df-cnext
blocks.content: Define the continuous extension of a given function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cnext(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(ccnext, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, ctop, cmpt(s2, co(cuni(cv(s1)), cpm, cuni(cv(s0))), ciun(s3, cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(s0)), cdm(cv(s2))), cxp(csn(cv(s3)), cfv(co(cv(s1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(s0)), csn(cv(s3))), crest, cdm(cv(s2)))), cv(s2)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-cnext(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ CnExt =(s0 ‚àà Top, s1 ‚àà Top ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(‚ãÉ s1[p‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ s0)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s3 ‚àà((cls ` s0)` dom(s2)),({ s3 } √ó((s1[fLimf](((nei ` s0)` { s3 })[|`t]dom(s2)))` s2)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
}

thm cnextval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wceq(co(c0, ccnext, c1), cmpt(s0, co(cuni(c1), cpm, cuni(c0)), ciun(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0)))))))

  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop, c1, ctop, ccnext, cmpt(s0, co(cuni(c1), cpm, cuni(c0)), ciun(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0))))), cmpt(s0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cpm, cuni(cv(hs0))), ciun(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0))))), cmpt(s0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cpm, cuni(c0)), ciun(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0))))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cpm, cuni(cv(hs0))), ciun(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0)))), co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cpm, cuni(c0)), ciun(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(cuni(cv(hs1)), cpm, cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  iuneq12d(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0))), cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1d(cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(s0)), cfv(ccl, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ccl)
  xpeq2d(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0)), cfv(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1d(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0), co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2d(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0))), co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq1d(cfv(cnei, cv(hs0)), csn(cv(s1)), cfv(cnei, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cnei)
  mpteq12dv(s0, co(cuni(cv(hs1)), cpm, cuni(c0)), ciun(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0)))), co(cuni(c1), cpm, cuni(c0)), ciun(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq1d(cuni(cv(hs1)), cpm, cuni(c0), cuni(c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  unieq(cv(hs1), c1)
  iuneq2d(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  xpeq2d(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0)), cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq1d(co(cv(hs1), cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0), co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0))))
  df-cnext(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  mptex(s0, co(cuni(c1), cpm, cuni(c0)), ciun(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0)))))
  ovex(cuni(c1), cpm, cuni(c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, co(cuni(c1), cpm, cuni(c0)), ciun(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cmpt(s0, co(cuni(c1), cpm, cuni(c0)), ciun(s1, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(s0))), cxp(csn(cv(s1)), cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s1))), crest, cdm(cv(s0)))), cv(s0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfv(ccl, cv(hs0)), cdm(cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ccl, cv(hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(s0)))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ccl, c0)
  diff.ccl.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)

  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, cuni(c1), cpm, cuni(c0))

thm cnextval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Top ‚àß c1 ‚àà Top)‚Üí(c0[CnExt]c1)=(s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c1[p‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c0)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` dom(s0)),({ s1 } √ó((c1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  ovmpt2(hs0, hs1, c0, ctop, c1, ctop, ccnext, (s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c1[p‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c0)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` dom(s0)),({ s1 } √ó((c1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0)))), (s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ hs1[p‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ hs0)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà((cls ` hs0)` dom(s0)),({ s1 } √ó((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` hs0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0)))), (s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ hs1[p‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c0)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` dom(s0)),({ s1 } √ó((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0)))))
  mpteq12dv(s0, (‚ãÉ hs1[p‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ hs0), ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà((cls ` hs0)` dom(s0)),({ s1 } √ó((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` hs0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0))), (‚ãÉ hs1[p‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c0), ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` dom(s0)),({ s1 } √ó((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0))), hs0 = c0)
  oveq2d(‚ãÉ hs1, cpm, ‚ãÉ hs0, ‚ãÉ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  iuneq12d(s1, ((cls ` hs0)` dom(s0)), ({ s1 } √ó((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` hs0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0)), ((cls ` c0)` dom(s0)), ({ s1 } √ó((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0)), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d((cls ` hs0), dom(s0), (cls ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, ccl)
  xpeq2d({ s1 }, ((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` hs0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0), ((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` hs0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0))), s0, (hs1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0))), hs0 = c0)
  oveq2d(hs1, cflf, (((nei ` hs0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)), (((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1d(((nei ` hs0)` { s1 }), crest, dom(s0), ((nei ` c0)` { s1 }), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d((nei ` hs0), { s1 }, (nei ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cnei)
  mpteq12dv(s0, (‚ãÉ hs1[p‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c0), ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` dom(s0)),({ s1 } √ó((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0))), (‚ãÉ c1[p‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c0), ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` dom(s0)),({ s1 } √ó((c1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0))), hs1 = c1)
  oveq1d(‚ãÉ hs1, cpm, ‚ãÉ c0, ‚ãÉ c1, hs1 = c1)
  unieq(hs1, c1)
  iuneq2d(s1, ((cls ` c0)` dom(s0)), ({ s1 } √ó((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0)), ({ s1 } √ó((c1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0)), hs1 = c1)
  xpeq2d({ s1 }, ((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0), ((c1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0), hs1 = c1)
  fveq1d((hs1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0))), s0, (c1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0))), hs1 = c1)
  oveq1(hs1, c1, cflf, (((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))
  df-cnext(hs0, hs1, s0, s1)
  mptex(s0, (‚ãÉ c1[p‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c0), ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` dom(s0)),({ s1 } √ó((c1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0))))
  ovex(‚ãÉ c1, cpm, ‚ãÉ c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c1[p‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c0)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` dom(s0)),({ s1 } √ó((c1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0)))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(ctop)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((s0 ‚àà(‚ãÉ c1[p‚Ü¶]‚ãÉ c0)‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s1 ‚àà((cls ` c0)` dom(s0)),({ s1 } √ó((c1[fLimf](((nei ` c0)` { s1 })[|`t]dom(s0)))` s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, (cls ` hs0), dom(s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ccl, hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, (cls ` c0), dom(s0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ccl, c0)
  diff.ccl.s(s1)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)

  diff.hs1.s(s0)

  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, ‚ãÉ c1, cpm, ‚ãÉ c0)

thm cnextfval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wf(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5))), wceq(cfv(co(c0, ccnext, c1), c2), ciun(s0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c3)), c2)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
} = {
  fvmptd(hs0, co(c0, ccnext, c1), c2, ciun(s0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), c3), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, c3)), c2))), co(cuni(c1), cpm, cuni(c0)), ciun(s0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(hs0))), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, cdm(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0)))), universe, wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wf(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5))))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wa(wf(c2, c3, c4), wss(c3, c5)), wceq(co(c0, ccnext, c1), cmpt(hs0, co(cuni(c1), cpm, cuni(c0)), ciun(s0, cfv(cfv(ccl, c0), cdm(cv(hs0))), cxp(csn(cv(s0)), cfv(co(c1, cflf, co(cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), crest, cdm(cv(hs0)))), cv(hs0)))))))
  cnextval(hs0, s0, c0, c1)

blocks.name: cnextcn
blocks.content: Extension by continuity. Theorem 1 of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.57. Given a topology ` J ` on ` C ` , a subset ` A ` dense in ` C ` , this states a condition for ` F ` from ` A ` to a regular space ` K ` to be extensible by continuity. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Jan-2018.)
